summary: The document comprises records associated with the Assassination Records Review Board, focusing on the HSCA staff payroll records of Denise L. McCray. It details notifications regarding document status, reasons for postponements, and correspondence about McCray's employment and resignation from the Select Committee on Assassinations. Included are payroll authorization forms and McCray's resume, which outlines her professional skills and experience.
key_findings: Partial postponement of the document was due to its significant historical interest and lack of evidence that release would be harmful.
Postponements were mainly because the documents contained Social Security numbers, considered an unwarranted invasion of personal privacy.
Details of Denise L. McCray's employment with the Select Committee on Assassinations are provided, including her resignation letter which cites personal and financial reasons.
The document features payroll authorization forms and a comprehensive resume of Denise L. McCray, showcasing her skills and work history.
